_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The recourse of the five faculties [sn48: The five faculties have recourse to the mind
The mind experiences their scopes and ranges
The mind has recourse to mindfulness
The unshakable faith of the Brahmin Uṇṇā: Faith that can't be shifted by any ascetic or brahmin or god or Māra or Brahmā or by anyone in the world.
